resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">羊妈妈带着小羊羔。 羊妈妈吃青草，亲亲小羊羔，伸出舌头舔小羊羔的绒毛。
resource.chars: 羊妈妈带着小羊羔。 羊妈妈吃青草，亲亲小羊羔，伸出舌头舔小羊羔的绒毛。

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">小羊羔吃羊妈妈的奶
resource.chars: 小羊羔吃羊妈妈的奶

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">猪圈里一窝小猪在大母猪身下又挤又叫又打滚，还抢着吃奶。
resource.chars: 猪圈里一窝小猪在大母猪身下又挤又叫又打滚，还抢着吃奶。

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">老花母鸡领着一群小鸡遛弯儿，一边遛一边逮小虫子吃。花母鸡叨着小虫子，大尖嘴对着小尖嘴地喂小鸡。母鸡咕咕，小鸡唧唧，多快乐呀！
resource.chars: 老花母鸡领着一群小鸡遛弯儿，一边遛一边逮小虫子吃。花母鸡叨着小虫子，大尖嘴对着小尖嘴地喂小鸡。母鸡咕咕，小鸡唧唧，多快乐呀！

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">三毛想起了妈妈，难过地托着小下巴。
resource.chars: 三毛想起了妈妈，难过地托着小下巴。

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">大黄狗带着一群小黄狗过来了，小黄狗摇着尾巴晃着脑袋，又蹦又跳“汪汪”直叫。
resource.chars: 大黄狗带着一群小黄狗过来了，小黄狗摇着尾巴晃着脑袋，又蹦又跳“汪汪”直叫。

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M337.35637,100.5386l77.60323,0l0,0l77.60323,0l0,35.50269l0,35.50269l-77.60323,0l-77.60323,0l0,-35.50269z" data-paper-data="{"defaultStrokeValue":1,"editStrokeValue":5,"currentStrokeValue":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_137e16a7-a43a-4e52-a298-ae1af4c7a146" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="0.62837" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">小三毛看着看着，再也忍不住了，轻轻地抱起一只小黄狗，流下了眼泪。
resource.chars: 小三毛看着看着，再也忍不住了，轻轻地抱起一只小黄狗，流下了眼泪。

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M95.43537,211.75943l30.16158,0l0,0l30.16158,0l0,69.12029l0,69.12029l-30.16158,0l-30.16158,0l0,-69.12029z" data-paper-data="{"defaultStrokeValue":1,"editStrokeValue":5,"currentStrokeValue":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_83dae733-d0cf-496b-8878-980dedaf8d75" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#ffff00" stroke-width="0.62837" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">老黄狗不让三毛抱它的小狗，冲着三毛“汪汪”叫， 还呲着牙想咬他。
resource.chars: 老黄狗不让三毛抱它的小狗，冲着三毛“汪汪”叫， 还呲着牙想咬他。

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 三毛吓得赶紧放下小狗，噌噌噌地爬上了树。
resource.chars: 三毛吓得赶紧放下小狗，噌噌噌地爬上了树。

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M221.96437,210.54612c11.48493,-9.07893 27.68628,-15.8397 43.96615,-15.83162l0,0l0,0c16.27987,0.00808 30.46236,6.33267 43.96615,15.83162c13.50379,9.49895 18.75254,23.97353 18.21137,38.22093c-0.54117,14.2474 -6.87225,28.26762 -18.21137,38.22093c-11.33912,9.95331 -27.68628,15.8397 -43.96615,15.83162c-16.27987,-0.00808 -32.49244,-5.91062 -43.96615,-15.83162c-11.47371,-9.921 -18.20857,-23.86045 -18.21137,-38.22093c-0.0028,-14.36048 6.72644,-29.142 18.21137,-38.22093z" data-paper-data="{"defaultStrokeValue":1,"editStrokeValue":5,"currentStrokeValue":5,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"editable":true,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null}" id="ellipse_fc34d373-886d-4694-8c99-200d0e6fde13" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#ffff00" stroke-width="3.1362" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">树上有个老鸹窝， 窝里有一只大黑老鸹， 还有几只小黑老鸹。它们亲亲热热挤在树枝编的温暖的窝里玩。
resource.chars: 树上有个老鸹窝， 窝里有一只大黑老鸹， 还有几只小黑老鸹。它们亲亲热热挤在树枝编的温暖的窝里玩。

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #fafafa;">三毛没人亲，没人疼，没人爱他，保护他。三毛止不住地痛哭起来，泪水哗哗地往下流……，三毛好伤心啊
resource.chars: 三毛没人亲，没人疼，没人爱他，保护他。三毛止不住地痛哭起来，泪水哗哗地往下流……，三毛好伤心啊

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M356.63607,188.01154c9.67609,-7.07044 23.32577,-12.33556 37.04161,-12.32927l0,0l0,0c13.71583,0.00629 25.66462,4.93173 37.04161,12.32927c11.37698,7.39755 15.79907,18.66998 15.34314,29.76549c-0.45593,11.09551 -5.78989,22.01411 -15.34314,29.76549c-9.55324,7.75139 -23.32577,12.33556 -37.04161,12.32927c-13.71583,-0.00629 -27.37497,-4.60305 -37.04161,-12.32927c-9.66664,-7.72622 -15.34077,-18.58191 -15.34314,-29.76549c-0.00236,-11.18358 5.66705,-22.69505 15.34314,-29.76549z" data-paper-data="{"defaultStrokeValue":1,"editStrokeValue":5,"currentStrokeValue":5,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"editable":true,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null}" id="ellipse_33c1ab7d-fbaa-4066-b8c0-defdfb7c67a4" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#ffff00" stroke-width="3.1362" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 三毛是个穷孩子。他在农村长大，从小就没有了爸爸，也没有了妈妈。三毛长得又瘦又小，只有脑袋大大的，上边就有三根稀稀拉拉的头发，人们就管他叫三毛。
resource.chars: 三毛是个穷孩子。他在农村长大，从小就没有了爸爸，也没有了妈妈。三毛长得又瘦又小，只有脑袋大大的，上边就有三根稀稀拉拉的头发，人们就管他叫三毛。
